converse.line: Help me!
Whoa, did I just hear you talk?
Yes, you heard correctly. I've been trying to get the attention of someone for a whole week and you're the only one who was able to hear me! The others thought I was just a noisy dog.
That's strange. But anyways, what do you need help with?
I'm a dog!
And?
I wasn't always a dog! I need your help transforming me back into a human. You're the only one who can help me! Please!

choice.line: Of course I'll help!
Really? Thank you!
But how do I transform you back?
I have no idea. I've been searching for that answer, but it's hard to do as a dog. I'll tell you how I ended up like this so you can maybe draw some clues from it.

I just started work at the new Nulato Lumbermill. The first day I went out, I decided to head deep into the forest, in order to get the further trees first. That way, as time passed, we would have to carry the logs less and less distances. The problem, as I soon found out, was there was an inhabitant in the forest. He was absolutely furious at me for cutting down one of his trees. So, he used some forest magic on me and turned me into a dog. I somehow found my way back to town to try to find some help.
Wow, sounds like you made that up. But I am talking to a dog, so I guess it is true. I'll see what I can do to help you.
Nah.
You're heartless!
Where was the forest you were in?
Between the towns of Mourilyan and Nulato. You have to travel through a cave to get there. If you're planning to go there, be careful of what you say and do around that forest man.
Alright.
Are you hungry?
Yes, actually. A little bit. Are you offering some food?
Yes, I have some of the finest dog food in the world for your consumption.
Very funny. I may have the body of a dog, but I still have my human tastes.
I didn't know magic existed.
It's really well hidden. I've only seen it twice. Only outcasts dare practice its ways. Really weird people.
Any magic users in the area?
Not that I know of. But you're sure to find one or two in every couple of towns. I can't really investigate as a dog.

converse.line: I've got this potion here that will turn you back.
Really? From some wizard or something? I'll try it!
Alright, puppy. Drink your medicine.
Don't say it like that!
Oh?
Oh.
Oh!
Uuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuu- ggggggggggggggggggggggggggghhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!
Huzah! I'm cured! Thank you so much!
Whoa, you look stunning. (Did I say that aloud?)
Thank you. I will find some way to repay your great kindness someday.
You don't have to do that. I'm fine with just seeing people happy. That's all I need.
What a kind soul you are.

choice.line: What are you going to do now?
Well, I'll need a different job that doesn't have so many risks on site. I've got to support my loving mother who is disabled and can't work.
(He's so dependable!) Wow. You've got a nice head on your shoulders.
Wow, is that a new dress? It looks great on you.
(OMG! Keep it cool.) It is. Thank you for noticing. I like your... muscles. (Ruined it!)
Ha! Thanks. I work on them every day at the gym.
Hey. You seem like a lot of fun. Want to see a movie or something when you're free? My treat.
(Aaaaaaaaaaaahhhhhh!) Yeah! That would be fun. (Score!)
You want to see "Edificionegro"?
(He's into romance too? Couldn't be more perfect!) Yeah! I can't wait!
